file_content.text: Admiral Ranken to all ships: Switch to atmospheric thrusters and prepare for assault. We are taking the Kuat Minedrome.
This is Admiral Ranken. This wargame simulates the Kuat Minedrome--live fire rules are in effect.
Republic forces are evacuating the Minedrome. Everything belongs to us.
Congratulations, squadron. The Minedrome is yours, along with bragging rights.
We're cutting our losses. All forces, evacuate! We'll win another day.
You've lost the Minedrome. Get your ships repaired and learn for the next time.
We need to finish this now, squadron!
We can't sustain more damage. Intercept and destroy!
We have the advantage. Deliver the killing blow.
Allied resource destroyed.
We've lost a resource.
Our infrastructure's damaged!
Priority target eliminated.
Priority target down.
Objective destroyed.
Updating objectives.
Priority target assigned.
New target available.
Capital ship incoming! Target all weapons!
Admiral Aygo here. Power up your guns--the Kuat Minedrome's under attack.
Admiral Aygo to all squadrons. We're here to test the Kuat Minedrome, see where we can shore up defenses.
Imperial forces are retreating. Repeat: the enemy is retreating! Good work, squadron.
You've shown off enough for one day. Good work, squadron--victory is yours.
Evacuate the facility! The Imps have won this round. We'll get them next time.
It's now or never, squadron. For the Republic!
Don't lose hope! Find their weakness and press on!
You can do this, squadron--just a little longer!
We've lost an asset!
Resource lost.
Asset destroyed.
Objective destroyed!
Check your target priorities.
Updating objectives.
We have a new target.
Priority target eliminated.
Enemy resource destroyed.
Capital ship inbound! Get ready for a fight!
Ground forces have established partial control already--keep our resources intact, torch anything Republic, and we'll all go home heroes.
Check your targeting computers for prime opportunities. Break and attack!
Droids are attempting to secure the facility planetside. Your squadron must defend allied holdings and obliterate enemy resources.
Primary targets will be sent to your displays. Wargame results will determine our ultimate plan for conquest.
Imps on the ground have taken part of the facility. Enemy starfighters are on the way.
Check your screens for primary objectives--you need to defend what we've got and take out whatever the enemy's manning. Go!
For the wargame, your enemy has starfighters in play and partial control of the facility. Defend your resources and take out enemy positions.
Priority targets will be fed to your screens. Good luck!
Wargame's over. You lost this one, but that was fine shooting. Heads high.
